name: Writing Transactional Emails
description: Creating personalized and informative transactional emails to keep your customers informed about their purchases and interactions.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Write a transactional email based on information {{type}} {{customer_information}} {{details}} {{tracking_information}} {{CTA}} {{brand_guidelines}}
Ensure the email is catchy, creative and engaging.

CTA.title: Call to Action Buttons
CTA.description: Add buttons for desired actions (e.g., "Track Your Order", "Shop Again").

type.title: Email Type
type.description: Select the specific type of transactional email you're creating (e.g., order confirmation, shipping notification, welcome email).

details.title: Order Details
details.description: Provide details of the relevant purchase, including order number, product information, and total amount.

ui_metadata.value: Order Number: 1234567890 Product Information: Fitness Tracker (Black) - Advanced activity tracking, heart rate monitoring, sleep analysis Wireless Headphones (Blue) - Noise-canceling technology, crystal clear sound Total Amount: $249.99

brand_guidelines.title: Brand Guidelines
brand_guidelines.description: If you have branding guidelines, include your logo and color scheme for a consistent look.

ui_metadata.value: Brand Name: FitLife, Brand Logo: [link to logo image] Color Scheme: Blue, Green, White

customer_information.title: Customer Information
customer_information.description: Enter the customer's name and email address.

tracking_information.title: Tracking Information
tracking_information.description: Include tracking information if applicable for shipped orders.
